decisions.title: Story Exercise Modal Redesign
decisions.detail: Completely redesigned customize story modal with centered layout, reduced padding/margins, smaller option pills and compact 380px maxWidth for better UX

decisions.title: Story Exercise Button Layout Fixed
decisions.detail: Repositioned theme toggle to left corner and fullscreen button to right corner with proper spacing (theme: left 16px, fullscreen: right 8px) to eliminate overlapping issues

decisions.title: Story Exercise Container Height Optimization
decisions.detail: Increased story content card height with paddingTop 100px, minHeight 600px, and proper button spacing. Later optimized to paddingTop 50px, minHeight 300px for better proportions

decisions.title: Story Generation System Overhaul
decisions.detail: Fixed story generation issues: improved OpenAI prompts for longer creative stories (250-500 words), completely rewrote mock story templates with real vocabulary integration instead of generic placeholders, increased max_tokens to 2000 and temperature to 0.8

decisions.title: Story Exercise Blank Areas Complete Redesign
decisions.detail: Fixed critical blank positioning issue where blanks overlapped text. Replaced View-in-Text structure with inline Text components (renderBlankInline), created proper inline styles (blankPillInline, emptyBlankInline), and made blanks much larger and user-friendly with minWidth 120px, better padding, and clear visual design

decisions.title: Story Exercise Word Selection Modal
decisions.detail: Added interactive word selection popup that opens when clicking blank areas. Includes modal overlay, available words filtering, proper state management (selectedBlankId, showWordSelectionModal), and clean modal design with word selection functionality
